messages.message:
Hi all, I wrote up a quick doc on storing nullable strings in Oracle. (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1OsCX0PsxdHfKsV_yEBYbYuX7glOuCwkEwnSdV1USGCg/edit) We keep tripping over this same problem -- hopefully circulating this knowledge more widely will help!

Long term, we can ban nullable strings in the database and get rid of this problem for good. However, banning null strings is up for debate, and it will also take some time to fix. In the meantime -- be careful with null strings!

cc @Sayd @Jeff
btw i think you need to share with `dept-Engineering`? i donâ€™t have access
Thanks, Matt! Never been a fan of nullable columns.
